Articles.Content:
Hello! I'm searching for easter eggs in the Kerbol system . The next target on my list is Kraken on Bop. I landed on coordinates found on the wiki, but there is no any signs of Kraken. I'm playing in version 1.2.1. Do you know if it even exist in this version of the game?

Edited November 24, 2018 by Sunstealer

Should be there.  I can't say for sure if I've seen it in that version, but I heard no previous reports of it being missing. Similar artifacts have sunk below the surface in some versions, depending on the terrain detail, so you might try that.

You can get confirmation that you are looking in the right place by scanning.  Kerbnet (new in version 1.2) will intermittently show a '?' over the easter-eggs, with odds and under conditions that might be explained in the wiki.   Alternatively, the SCANsat mod, if you use it or want to use it, will build up a surface map including easter-eggs if you put its MULTI sensor in an orbit that eventually sweeps the relevant parts of the surface.

Edited November 24, 2018 by OHara
speling
